All Classes

Class Description
Actions
Enumerates all possible player actions.
Card
The Card class represents the card model to make card objects It contains three parameters : Shape, Color, And Filled
Card.Color
The possible colors of a card
Card.Filled
Is the card filled or hollow ?
Card.Shape
The possible shapes of a card
ConsoleView
Represents the command-line interface.
Controller
Main game controller in the MVC architecture.
Events
Enumerates all dispatchable events.
GameManager
The main class of the game, it handle turns and rounds The class extends a Observable class to communicate with the view
GamePanel  
GamePanelController
Represents the controller of the game panel.
GamePanelView
Represents the view of a game panel in the MVC architecture.
HomePanel  
HomePanelController
Represents the controller of the home panel.
HomePanelView
Represents the view of a home panel in the MVC architecture.
ImageButton
Display a button with an image as a background.
ImageUtil
This class is an util for creating Image and ImageView objects from an URL.
Input
This class is an util for handling CLI-based inputs.
Layout
The mother class of the differents layouts The class extends a Observable class
Layout.Name
DIfferent types of layouts
LayoutCircle  
LayoutRectangle  
LayoutVisitor
The LayoutVistor class, used for counting points
Location
Util class to store x and y for a card location
Main
The main class of the application, from which the application is started.
PhysicalPlayer  
Player
The Player class, that stores all the player infos and defines all the different abstract methods
PlayerContext  
PopupPanel  
PopupPanelController
Represents the controller of the popup panel.
PopupPanelView
Represents the view of a popup panel in the MVC architecture.
Settings
The class that ask and contains all the informations on the game Is Called by different classes to get different parameters as variant, layout, players...
SettingsPanel  
SettingsPanelController
Represents the controller of the settings panel.
SettingsPanelView
Represents the view of a settings panel in the MVC architecture.
Stack
The class is the stack of the game, containing all the unused cards...
Variant  
Variant.Name  
VariantRandomSwitch  
VariantSecondChance  
VirtualPlayer  
VirtualPlayerEasy  
VirtualPlayerHard  
Window
The main class of the graphical user interface.
